author: Filipe Governa
comment: Good watchface with full-color ambient mode and hourly vibration, too bad no manual weather location. Update 1: -1 for developer reply. Conversion from € to €? Seems developer doesn't understand concept of user review and uses developer reply to attack reviews. Not cool, I paid for the app. All mentioned features are available elsewhere. Update 2: - 1 for unsolicited notification ads.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: There was no attack. The applied price in the dev account is set without the taxes of each country. Google applies the taxes after that, that is why it is not 1€ on the dot. Like you said, you paid for the app, clearly identified. Not something not existing :) Anyway, I will add them on my todo, and see what I can do.

author: Brice Hinchman
comment: Widgets need premium access. Wanted steps but couldnt set it up. Watch face cool and works.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Your rating is a bit hard if you think that the watch face is cool & works. Everything can not be for free :)

author: Vinny Bolt
comment: Favorite watch face. Very cyberpunk. Premium allows full complications, fast and smooth.
They got missed calls and steps

author: Derrick Koller
comment: Purchased the premium great interactive watch face

author: Paul Carr
comment: Would be great, but limit widgets with free version

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. You can not have every thing for free;) the main purpose of the free version is to try the design and see if you like it. There are already a lot of options available for free

author: RaR0inb0x
comment: These guy's make the best watch face! Love this one works brilliant. Please make more futuristic animated ones awesome job

author: Christopher Claxton
comment: Very functional, easy to read, configure, and use, eye catching, and good features... Premium is a good value add.
Have a lot if thema watch faces and love them all.

author: حامد کلیایی
comment: Very good

author: Ahmmed Tushar
comment: Nice

author: Saikat Pathak
comment: Good

author: Colin Wolfson
comment: I've been using the premium version for ages. I love it and it's never caused me any issues. My Moto 360 (2nd Gen) always has plenty of battery left at the end of the day.

author: Spike Holden
comment: Looks good and works unlike faces from others (eg richface). Edit: battery hog

author: XP Tran
comment: Garbage nonsense. Doesnt work on Note5 Samsung - DELETE

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Can you send me some details about your issue by email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: jason fonte
comment: For an older version.

author: Brandon Laughlin
comment: I really like the way this watch face looks and I would totally purchase the premium features if the weather widget worked. I've gone through all of the settings on the watch and the phone but the tile where the weather should display only shows --°F  That is the only thing holding me back from rating 5 stars and purchasing premium. Any advice?    Edit: So after restarting my watch the weather now shows up. I will be purchasing premium.  Edit 2: And after using the watch for  while the temp is no longer showing in the widget. What's the deal?

author: Colin Ritter
comment: Eye catching and still readable. I think it would be cool if different sections of the watch face could be made different colors.  My only real complaint is it seems to use a lot of battery on my phone.

author: Worrying Drake
comment: Bought this face ages ago loved it upgraded to premium, changed my phone from an iPhone to one plus and ive never been able to update or change the settings since. Redownloaded it twice paid for it again upgraded to premium again, face app won't open just takes me to Google store and offers to uninstall it. It's on my watch but you can't change any of the settings. Other faces I have install to my phone and I can change whatever I want.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. To access the settings, just open the "Android Wear" app on your mobile. Then hit the "gear icon" displayed over the watch face preview, and the settings screen will be displayed :)

author: E. Ironbar
comment: Looks really nice. Simple and eye-catching.

author: Michael Gill
comment: I'd like a few more controls to change the color of a few screen elements and the ability to save my favorite combinations. This watch face eats an additional 15%-20% of my battery after 14 hours of use with full color ambient setting on. I end the day at 11pm with 15% left on my battery. If I know I'm going out that night I'm careful to charge my phone at the end of the afternoon.

author: Mike Usmiani
comment: Not for s2 or s3. You have to read full description before you find that out. Complete waste of time, complete garbage

reply.author: thema
reply.content: It is written in bold in the beginning of the description, and on the first picture. You can not really miss it. Plus, there is nothing in this store for Gear s2 nor s3... I do not know why you came in the Google Play Store for watch faces.

author: Colin Santich
comment: I want my money back. I searched for S3 watch faces this was the 3rd on on the list... I bought it and now see it's not for S2 or S3.. seems like a scam to me!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: As described in BOLD on the Play store page, this application is an Android Wear watchface, not compatible with Tizen. Your rating is a bit unfair, because this is not an issue of the application :) Send me your order number for the refund. The Gear S2/S3 watch face are in the Samsung Galaxy Apps store, you can find my designs by searching "thema"

author: Devendra Sinh Jadeja
comment: Very nice watch face

author: Terry Dearman
comment: First I want to say this is an awesome watchface as is all the others made by this person/company. But....Why do I have to pay premium for every watchface I get? Had I have known I would have just done the dollar everytime instead of $5 and thinking that unlocks all the faces.

author: austin cantor
comment: I like it but to buy premium you have to pay

author: Jarett Bailey
comment: Nice design.  A lot of features for the free version but happy to pay to unlock the extra as I've done on his other offerings.  The Dev is also very quick to assist with technical questions.  Very satisfied.

author: Jason H.
comment: Immediately crashes on my Q founder running Android Wear 2.0

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Can you send me a bug report of the watch to thema.apps@gmail.com? I'll be happy to help you.

author: Daniel Aramayo
comment: Doesn't work on Nexus 6P and Huawei watch. Can't find the app niether on phone or watch even after resynchronizing apps

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi,

Did you install the watch face on both mobile and watch? 
You must install it on both device. Android wear 2.0 does not sync the application automatically as Android wear 1.5 did. You must install it by opening the Google Play Store on your watch and install the app.
Please send me an email to thema.apps@gmail.com, I'll be happy to help you.

comment: Great app, you need to add email notifications to watch face other than gmail.

author: Sensei Llanes
comment: Needs updates for gear s2

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. As described on the Play store page, This application is an Android Wear watch face, not compatible with Gear S2/S3. Futuristic GUI is available for Gear S2/S3 in the Samsung Galaxy Apps store, by searching "Thema". Your rating is a bit unfair, because this is not an issue of the application :)

author: Jeffrey West
comment: Does as advertised. Love it.

author: Charles Lebohang
comment: I still love it

author: Steven Kirby
comment: Good looking watch face but I payed for the premium features and they're not working on my huawei watch. Toggles for flashlight and timer shortcuts just do nothing. If these features worked if definitely good this watch a 5.

author: Jason McCrory
comment: Slick face and nice functionality. Gives me information I need at a glance. Uses a little more battery than other faces but not so much that it's a problem. Overall a great app!

author: Mitch D
comment: Brilliant watchface, only concern is that when I turn my watch screen on the watchface flashes black and white before setting on the colour I have chosen, resetting device has temp fixed but it returns within minutes, will still use though.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. I assume that you have a moto 360. This will be the case for all watch faces that have a black & white ambient mode. You can choose to disable the ambient mode in the settings of your Android Wear app (settings in the top right corner > your watch > ambient mode)

author: Michael Meade
comment: Super-interactive, intuitive and slick. I love the grey options for subdued lighting, and the widgets are very interactive. Fantastic watchface!

author: Bxnd Cabs
comment: Amazing faces watching

author: tony Lashlee
comment: Very cool

author: tony sharon
comment: The best and coolest watch face I've found on Android wear.
